main event: A civilian reported observing a peculiar object in the sky while watching television in New Bedford, Massachusetts in May 1966.
interesting points: The object was initially thought to be an airplane but was observed to hover and change in size and shape.,The witness called family members to observe the object who agreed it was not an airplane.,The object hovered in one spot and moved rapidly in different directions.,The sighting lasted for about 10 to 20 minutes before the object disappeared rapidly., The report concluded that there was insufficient data for evaluation.
witness description: a civilian and his family members
